title: Pass interference update, Texans' mess and Gurley workload (Football 6/21)
description:
Dave Richard and Jason La Canfora pair up for the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast to break down the latest on pass interference, pre-Training Camp storylines and a possible extension for Michael Thomas. The guys then dive into some original reporting, first on the mess in the Texans front office right now and then on Todd Gurley's knee. Finally Dave and JLC share their thoughts on Pete Prisco's Top 100 Players list. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
